| History                 = '''Pockets Postal''' is a courier service run by [[Pockets Possum (Earth-616)|Pockets Possum]] and his partner [[Shrub (Earth-616)|Shrub]].{{r|Rocket Raccoon and Groot Vol 1 2}} They were hired by [[Groot (Earth-616)|Groot]] to deliver the ''[[Flora colossi]]'' to [[Rocket Raccoon (Earth-616)|Lord Rakzoon]]; however, upon making the delivery, Pockets and Shrub were accused of being thieves and thrown in the dungeon to await execution.{{r|Rocket Raccoon and Groot Vol 1 1}}

The pair made a deal with the also imprisoned former dictator of the planet, [[Nasoj (Earth-616)|High Ruler Nosaj]], then tried to have Rocket and Groot killed; however, their plan backfired when Nosaj decided to have all four killed instead. The quartet escaped the palace, but Pockets still held a grudge against Rocket for imprisoning them and almost getting them killed, so Rocket responded by stealing Pockets' ship, leaving Pockets and Shrub stranded.{{r|Rocket Raccoon and Groot Vol 1 3}}
